description: Maintains an internal sequence number that is set to a message property. The sequence number is increased by 1 with each invocation. Note: The sequence number is set as a string property.

properties.name: initvalue
properties.label: Initial Sequence Value
properties.description: Provide the initial value of the sequence.

properties.name: property
properties.label: Property
properties.description: Provide the name of the property that is set to the next sequence number.
